metadata.title: USN-6068-1 -- Open vSwitch vulnerability
metadata.description: David Marchand discovered that Open vSwitch incorrectly handled IP packets with the protocol set to 0. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6068-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  openvswitch-doc - 3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.3 openvswitch-switch - 3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.3 openvswitch-pki - 3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.3 openvswitch-common - 3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.3 openvswitch-testcontroller - 3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.3 openvswitch-source - 3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.3 openvswitch-vtep - 3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.3 openvswitch-ipsec - 3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.3 python3-openvswitch - 3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.3 openvswitch-switch-dpdk - 3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.3 openvswitch-test - 3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.3 No subscription required
